name: Arla, the Hegemon of the Sky
text:
Flying
When this card enters your field, search your main deck for an Angel resonator, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
God's Art <Rain of Arrows> WW2: Whenever a J/resonator you control attacks this turn, this card deals 400 damage to target resonator your opponent controls for each time J/resonators you control attacked this turn. (Play God's Art <Rain of Arrows> only once per game.)
set: The Seven Kings of the Lands
